title: Meesho fined ₹10 lakh for allowing sale of uncertified walkie-talkies
description: This is the largest penalty the CCPA has imposed on any e-commerce platform so far over the sale of uncertified walkie-talkies. Others such as Reliance JioMart, Talk Pro, The MaskMan Toys and Chimiya were previously fined  ₹1 lakh each.
content: The Central Consumer Protection Authority (CCPA) has issued its final order against Fashnear Technologies Pvt. Ltd, parent company of e-commerce platform Meesho, for allowing the sale of walkie-talki… [+8165 chars]
